data.comment: Today's referee, Dennis Higler, has blown to start the match.
In the minute 28, An attacking Alkmaar player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Heerenveen's Jan Paul van Hecke has been booked in Heerenveen.
Teun Koopmeiners converts the penalty to give Alkmaar a 0-1 lead.
Great finish from Lucas Woudenberg to give Alkmaar a 0-2 lead.
In the minute 41, Owen Wijndal instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 46, Johnny Jansen (Heerenveen) is making a first substitution, with Ibrahim Dresevic replacing Oliver Batista Meier.
It's now 0-3 in Heerenveen as Jesper Karlsson scores for Alkmaar.
Albert Gudmundsson with an assist there.
In the minute 67, Rami Hajal is replacing Benjamin Nygren for Heerenveen at Abe Lenstra Stadion.
Alkmaar make their first substitution with Zakaria Aboukhlal replacing Fredrik Midtsjo.
Arne Slot is making the team's second substitution at Abe Lenstra Stadion with Tijani Reijnders replacing Jesper Karlsson.
